title: Toxic ass players
body:
Whats up with these toxic ass smurfs or just toxic playes in general

Its a game, and you tell us to slit our throats and sht cause we get a bad game or youre in an elo that you dont even belong in?

get a life, go outside, breathe in some air, or maybe play in your elo lmao

replies.body:
If you are talking about general discussion.
i suggest you leave this post there.
